Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~Clayton Sims this needs more detail. Upgrade flow for what? Components? Chaincode?

Action.author: zamrokk
Action.body: ~ChristopherFerris and ~Clayton Sims : I do not see documentation for upgrading chaincode here ( https://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io)|https://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io%29/ . I suppose this is linked to FAB-183 , right ?
